attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This is what happened when I downloaded the app I am just sitting their on my toaster warming up then my blind dad knocked on my door and said he saw a chicken at McDonald’s so I when their and I told my deaf mom the directions to the McDonald’s then they said it was ok but then we where running late to my disabled sisters track meet and when we got their I saw her running her fastest then we went to my house and I saw Kobe then I went to bed

attributes.title: THIS APP WILL TAKE YOUR RIGHTS AWAY!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what bunker baby was up to but as soon as i downloaded it i got a pop up notification that my rights were revoked! i understand i am a woman and trump hates women... but i never thought he would take it this far. i tried uninstalling it to get my rights back, but i cant find them again! please send help i need the small amount of rights and respect i had prior to downloading this app!

attributes.title: Stupidity at its finest
attributes.review: This app is dumb and stupid and slow this Is a waste of life. If you value your phone I suggest do not download it blew up my phone and the phone nexts me while repetitively screaming vote trump 2020 my eyes were bleeding the dogs were screeching basically turn my house into hell with the words vote trump 2020 think of your worst nightmare and times that by 10 because that’s what this app is turned my life into the end have a good day.

attributes.title: I REGRET GETTING THIS APP!!!😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: Guys this APP TAKES YOU INTO BOKU NO PICO!!!! I was just chillin with this app when this flash of light came out of NOWHERE!!! When I opened my eyes.. BOOM💥BOKU NO PICO!!! After YEARS IN THERE I FINALLY Found my way out!!!!!! TikTok omg just 🤩 it opened up a dimensional wormhole and took me back to the real word but when I came back my room was FLIPPED UPSIDE DOWN!!! I deleted this app as quick as sonic and boom tiktok turned it back up right I 20/20 recommend Tiktokinstead 👏👌         -✨✊🏻🙈💐member 🧝🏿🧚🏻of🍪☕️the😎agency🤪😇bakugo💥🙈✊🏿✨

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRID!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president and shortly after it crashed so I uninstalled! Then all of a sudden Donald J Trump himself bursted into my house and dragged me by my hair and pummeled me until i was unconscious! He spray painted “donny was here” on my garage door and stole all of my belongings! He then had his men hack into my phone and replaced all my pictures and contacts with photos of him! Worst app ever! Im in the hospital recovering from his beating! Luckily only small bruising from tiny hands. 😔

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: this app will steal all 15 of your cats and replace them with robots that watch you at night and purr too loud for comfort. one robot started to glitch and ended up putting me in the ER because it attacked me and that’s when i knew trump had stolen all my cats. i got rid of the robots because he didn’t need to know what was in my basement and replaced them with 15 more cats but he did it again!! i don’t know what to do anymore, someone please help 😭😭

attributes.title: 0 STARS IF I COULD
attributes.review: So before I downloaded this app my phone was great and worked amazing. After downloading it every time I would pick up my phone it would shock me! Not to mention the amount of notifications this app gives me is ridiculous! I leave my phone for 5 minutes and I would come back to 60 notifications! My phone would be nonstop buzzing! As soon as I deleted it my phone was fine. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.title: this app broke my phonahsisosn
attributes.review: first of all i was walking around and my head was so cold and a snake was in the shower infront of my life so i took the time to stop my food from the old school pizza it was so yummy in my house. after that happened to me he said he didn’t know what he was doing. yes i did it all to fall off the wagon again because who wouldn’t wanna be a good giraffe?? yes it did break my leg and the rest of your day but it’s not really that way in my mind 😣🤮 anyways this app is the most disgusting thing to ever happen in my class to the right person and it will not happen until they say that old is the best kind to use inside the store but it’s okay to go smoke with a dog park in a car 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: I am appalled
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to learn more about Trump and his campaign plans, but like and behold I open up the app and it immediately seems to glitch, my phone has been ringing off the hook and sending me text updates about Trump and his whereabouts including photos which are too offensive to even speak of here. 
May god have mercy on his soul for contributing nothing but negativity and disgust images of his orange, disgusting, micro penis and vulgar existence.
